10becc54-eef6-464d-b460-860d8006b9ec.name: 健康
10becc54-eef6-464d-b460-860d8006b9ec.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b49d9ceb-495e-451f-aec4-cb6cc1d374a9.name: Fit, Very
b49d9ceb-495e-451f-aec4-cb6cc1d374a9.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

40e9ef62-c70d-412c-b897-8a7a61a1f2c7.name: 可选增益
40e9ef62-c70d-412c-b897-8a7a61a1f2c7.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

22c3c694-19a2-4fd4-bb2b-6a6e5b494e48.name: Another 25 points from
22c3c694-19a2-4fd4-bb2b-6a6e5b494e48.notes: Or from previous traits. Or spend points to start with additional gear.

9f1bb06d-6543-4dc0-ad85-388b88a53f70.name: 特化
9f1bb06d-6543-4dc0-ad85-388b88a53f70.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

877ccc44-9132-4364-bbb3-a99a3f6ca865.name: 特化
877ccc44-9132-4364-bbb3-a99a3f6ca865.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

fe33bc83-5f4e-4780-bd19-3dd5f3cbbd32.name: 特化
fe33bc83-5f4e-4780-bd19-3dd5f3cbbd32.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

10411e5f-60a9-4371-97a2-dfaa7e1555e7.name: 战斗反射
10411e5f-60a9-4371-97a2-dfaa7e1555e7.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

e69adb7f-d391-4b83-becd-a0154ba0b563.name: 硬皮
e69adb7f-d391-4b83-becd-a0154ba0b563.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

51bf37ea-ab61-4152-b721-7bab19cce300.name: 仆从
51bf37ea-ab61-4152-b721-7bab19cce300.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

4d0ab7d6-1ea4-48e2-bdd9-1f36d096f36c.name: 感同身受
4d0ab7d6-1ea4-48e2-bdd9-1f36d096f36c.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

6c3a6f6e-4290-48de-a208-cf373fb0e37b.name: 感同身受
6c3a6f6e-4290-48de-a208-cf373fb0e37b.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

7bdc819e-45a0-499a-bcc4-9982ed98c7f7.name: 感同身受
7bdc819e-45a0-499a-bcc4-9982ed98c7f7.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

81f1dd04-3c98-4c39-9a7b-8dc35deb944f.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

bfa333d2-ce61-409a-8eb1-3b329091f27b.name: 幸运
bfa333d2-ce61-409a-8eb1-3b329091f27b.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次
